title: Does Russell Wilson trade to Broncos rank among biggest in NFL history?

sentence: For one, Wilson, 33 years young, isnt Herschel Walker.
author: Sean Keeler
title: Keeler: Russell Wilson isnt Herschel Walker. Broncos arent 1989 Vikings. Anybody who says George Paton got robbed is full of it.

sentence: Considering the players and picks involved, it was the modern-day version of Dallas trading Herschel Walker to the Minnesota Vikings in 1989.
author: Sam Farmer
title: How the Broncos were able to keep the Russell Wilson trade with Seahawks a secret
